Oxford House
Multiple Locations
https://www.oxfordhouseco.org/

helps with food, meds, no benis or money needed, not used within 3 months usually, NO SO, if they required locked facility, none if on M1 hold, acute crisis interventions within 6 or less months. Has SI/HI in last 6 months, actively trying to harm themselves within last 6 months. Homes staffed 24/7 with QMAP. Staff are cooking and basic cleaning, most need to keep up with their own ADL, unlocked doors and hands off. Intensive case manager. Optional programs. So long as they're not decomping/isolating. They pay first, work on getting them on waivers with SSI/medicaid/etc/hcbs; needs 6 month mental health history; new homes opening up with less criteria including only 3 month mental health history, dogs?
